word: There are wealthy men who have in trust the Lord's money, and we have a perfect right to ask them to help us in our missionary work. We have a work to be carried on in all parts of the world, and must have means. Will not some of these wealthy men come to our help? The scripture we have read [Isaiah 60.] encourages us to believe that they will. There are some who would consider it a privilege.--MS. 113, 1908.
